personalInfo.name: Ashish Walia
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer (Web & Mobile apps)
personalInfo.subtitle: Building scalable applications across mobile, web, and cloud platforms
bio: Hello! I'm Ashish, a full-stack software developer based in Delhi, India.

I specialize in building end-to-end solutions - from native mobile apps and cross-platform solutions to robust backend systems and cloud infrastructure. My expertise spans across Android, iOS, Flutter for mobile development, modern web frameworks like React and Next.js, and backend technologies including Node.js and Laravel.
With experience serving millions of users, I focus on delivering high-performance, scalable applications with seamless user experiences.

experience.company: Jamir Digital Business Services (OPC) Private Ltd.

projects.name: Bingeboxx
